Business: Geotechnical basic surveys with registration of: - Report number/name and point number - Drilling depth - Whether it is drilled itowards mountains - If it is drilled in mountains - If it is quick clay - If it is peat - What type of probing or test - x, y, z (coordinates) - Who owns the data
DataProtocol: originally based on SOSI-standard. dataset has been extended a lot over the years and has deviated from that standard
Commments: API can be made quickly by publishing dataset on geoserver
